message: To implement `nsa` correctly, we need to delegate to the CUDA-accelerated kernels in `native_sparse_attention.ops.parallel` when running on CUDA, falling back to `native_sparse_attention.ops.naive` otherwise, handling both fixed and variable-length sequences, gating, scaling, and return formats. I'll inspect the `parallel_nsa` and `naive_nsa` implementations to mirror their signatures and logic.

args.content: To implement `nsa` correctly, we need to delegate to the CUDA-accelerated kernels in `native_sparse_attention.ops.parallel` when running on CUDA, falling back to `native_sparse_attention.ops.naive` otherwise, handling both fixed and variable-length sequences, gating, scaling, and return formats. I'll inspect the `parallel_nsa` and `naive_nsa` implementations to mirror their signatures and logic.
